articles.title: Australia vs Pakistan, 2nd Test: Frustrated Shaheen Afridi Sledges Marnus Labuschagne During Intense.. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Shaheen Afridi was seen sledging Marnus Labuschagne early in the second session as the Australian batter survived a fiery spell from Pakistan's pace ace
articles.content: Pakistan pacer Shaheen Afridi and Australia's Marnus Labuschagne were involved in a heated exchange on Day 1 of the ongoing Boxing Day Test at the Melbourne Cricket Ground on Tuesday. Shaheen was see… [+3000 chars]
